A sense of humour is always welcome!
Whitsundays Snorkelling Adventure and Whitehaven Beach
Each Ocean Rafting day offers three days in one, including an exhilarating ride to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet, pristine Whitsundays snorkelling reefs and guided Whitsunday Island National Parks walks.
The Northern Exposure eco adventure is a favourite amongst avid snorkellers because it is the only Whitsunday adventure which includes two different snorkel destinations.  Enjoy snorkelling around Hook Island including Mantaray Bay, Maureens Cove and other specially selected Whitsundays snorkelling spots, ensuring a memorable underwater experience.
The tour also includes a visit to the stunning beach at Hill Inlet, north end of Whitehaven Beach, and a guided National Park walk to Hill Inlet lookout above the silica sand of Whitehaven.  We are the only tour to have direct access to Hill Inlet beaches, where you can explore, enjoy an optional fresh tropical lunch pack served at the beach and swim in the crystal clear turquoise ocean or just relax on the silica white sand.  Small groups allow you to experience this tropical paradise away from the crowds.
The main difference between the two tours is that the Northern Exposure has more snorkelling time and the
offers more beach time.
A visit to Hill Inlet, Whitehaven Beach and snorkelling pristine coral reefs all in one day, along with the “ride of your life”, allows for a very special adventure!
Please note: If you are travelling to the Whitsundays on a cruise ship, the timings of this experience do not align with the visiting cruise ship schedule.  This tour is available from Daydream Island – please refer to
Northern Exposure ex Daydream Island
page for more information.
Want this and more?
Why not view the Whitsundays from above on our popular
Fly and Raft package
, showcasing the best of the Whitsunday Islands and Great Barrier Reef in one day with a 60 minute scenic flight and Ocean Rafting adventure!

Book Fly & Raft Southern Lights
Fly Raft 60 minute Whitsunday scenic flight & Ocean Rafting package
See the Whitsundays from above with a stunning Whitsunday scenic flight over the islands and Great Barrier Reef, including famous Heart Reef and Whitehaven Beach, then ride the tropical waters on Ocean Rafting’s Southern Lights or Northern Exposure tour.
Enjoy a bird’s eye view of many of the 74 Whitsunday Islands, fly over Whitehaven Beach and picture postcard Hill Inlet before heading out to the Great Barrier Reef and experiencing one of the most photographed reef locations, Heart Reef. The comfortable fixed wing aircraft offers
offers guaranteed window seats with big window viewing
, pilot commentary and the best views of the Whitsundays!
Following your flight, enjoy an Ocean Rafting adventure, offering three days in one, including an exhilarating ride to Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet, pristine snorkelling reefs and guided Whitsunday Island National Parks walks. The Southern Lights tour offers more beach time and the Northern Exposure tour offers more snorkelling time.
We recommend this tour for the best view above, on and below the water in the Whitsundays!
For stunning aerial views of the Whitsundays without the Ocean Rafting component, 60 minute scenic flights over the Whitsunday Islands and Great Barrier Reef, including Heart Reef, Whitehaven Beach and Hill Inlet are available.  Visit the
page for more information.
Whitsunday Airport … just 8 minutes from Airlie Beach
Ocean Rafting’s scenic flights depart from
, located at 12 Air Whitsunday Drive, Flame Tree, between the popular tourist destinations of Airlie Beach and the Whitsunday Islands and just 8 minutes drive from the main street of Airlie Beach. Whitsunday Airport is perfectly located to take you on the flight of a lifetime while offering a range of comfortable facilities, including an air-conditioned airport lounge, café, bathroom amenities, free wifi, refillable water station, charging ports, secure lockers and free parking to enjoy before or after your flight.
Hangar Cafe & Bar
offers ‘airside access’ dining, where you can indulge in delicious food, unreal coffee or a cold beverage from the relaxed bar. Pre-order your breakfast before your scenic flight departure and enjoy alfresco dining while enjoying your meal on return to mainland Australia!
View Whitsunday Airport’s Live Camera here!
PLEASE NOTE: Full names and exact weights p
=== TOUR END: Fly Raft Northern Exposure ===

A sense of humour is always welcome!
At the northern end of Whitehaven Beach, enjoy a guided bushwalk to spectacular Hill Inlet Lookout to view and capture photographs of the stunning swirling silica sands and aqua water.  Ocean Rafting is the only tour to have direct access to all areas of the stunning and iconic Hill Inlet beach to ensure you enjoy the most memorable experience of this special place.
Snorkel for over an hour at Border Island, Dumbell Island, or one of our “secret” snorkel spots and enjoy the amazing hard and soft corals of the fringing reefs, as well as a huge range of marine life including colourful fish, turtles, clams and so much more, all of which call the inner coral reefs home.
Ocean Rafting has the fastest day boats in the Whitsundays, meaning it is not only an adventurous ride, but distances are covered in a shorter time, leaving more time for activities.  The semi rigid inflatable vessels are super fast allowing guests to experience a fun ride, adventure and education amongst the natural beauty of the Whitsundays.    You can see why we call it three days in one!
The main difference between the two tours is that the Southern Lights has more beach time and the
offers more snorkelling time.
Please note: If you are travelling to the Whitsundays on a cruise ship, the timings of this experience do not align with the visiting cruise ship schedule. This tour is available from Daydream Island – please refer to
Southern Lights ex Daydream Island
page for more information.
Want this and more?
Why not view the Whitsundays from above on our popular
Fly and Raft package
, showcasing the best of the Whitsunday Islands and Great Barrier Reef in one day with a 60 minute scenic flight and Ocean Rafting adventure!

– EveCalgary, via TripAdvisor

60 minute reef and island scenic flight with guaranteed window seat
Views of Whitehaven Beach, Hill Inlet and Heart Reef
60 minute Heart Reef scenic flight
See the Whitsundays from above with a stunning Whitsunday 60 minute scenic flight over the islands and Great Barrier Reef, including famous Heart Reef and Whitehaven Beach.
Enjoy a bird’s eye view of many of the 74 Whitsunday Islands, fly over Whitehaven Beach and picture postcard Hill Inlet before heading out to the Great Barrier Reef and experiencing one of the most photographed reef locations, Heart Reef. The comfortable fixed wing aircraft
offers guaranteed window seats with big window viewing
, pilot commentary and the best views of the Whitsundays!
Courtesy pick up transfers are included. All timings will be confirmed upon booking.
Whitsunday Airport … just 8 minutes from Airlie Beach
Ocean Rafting’s scenic flights depart from
, located at 12 Air Whitsunday Drive, Flame Tree, between the popular tourist destinations of Airlie Beach and the Whitsunday Islands and just 8 minutes drive from the main street of Airlie Beach. Whitsunday Airport is perfectly located to take you on the flight of a lifetime while offering a range of comfortable facilities, including an air-conditioned airport lounge, café, bathroom amenities, free wifi, refillable water station, charging ports, secure lockers and free parking to enjoy before or after your flight.
Hangar Cafe & Bar
offers ‘airside access’ dining, where you can indulge in delicious food, unreal coffee or a cold beverage from the relaxed bar. Pre-order your breakfast before your scenic flight departure and enjoy alfresco dining while enjoying your meal on return to mainland Australia!
View Whitsunday Airport’s Live Camera here!
PLEASE NOTE: For bookings within 24 hours of departure please call (07) 4946 6848. Full names and exact weights per passenger must be advised when booking due to flight weight availability.
*Scenic flights depart from the mainland and unfortunately are not available for guests of Long Island, Hamilton Island, Hayman Island or Daydream Island.
**Please note: The above tour itineraries are a guideline only and are subject to change depending on tide, wind and other weather conditions. 100% cancellation fee applies for cancellations after midday the day prior. Maximum per seat weight is 125 kgs. Any major discrepancies between weight provided at the time of booking and actual weight at the airport may result in inability to travel. For legal and safety reasons all passengers are weighed prior to boarding and any weight inconsistencies or passengers over the weight limit will result in a 100% fee and inability to participate. Rates shown are valid for travel until 31 March 26.  For travel after that date, relevant rates will display when future dates are selected in the booking table. Please call Ocean Rafting 48 hours prior to departure on 07 4946 6848 to reconfirm booking and pick up time.
